description: By the end of this course, you will be able to demonstrate appropriate and effective strategies when engaging in coaching conversations with those that you lead. By exploring and analyzing common coaching scenarios that are acted out in this course, you will have a great sense of what works well and not so well during such a conversation. The final assignment is all about actually having a coaching conversation with another person where you can apply everything you've learned in this course (and throughout the Coaching Skills for Managers specialization). After going through the course materials and completing the assessments, you will be able to have effective one-on one-coaching meetings with those you manage and deepen your understanding of the essential practice of coaching conversations.
title: Coaching Conversations
